chat.msg: hi there! que comience el juego!!
HOW
hey! i'm now at the starting point
i see a twig to the left leads to a small island with a tiger on it. which way should i go?
great! go straight
alright! i'm now on the small island with the tiger
where to now, amigo?
USe the twig and go to the island with the map!
oops! i don't see an island with a map
i do see an island with a butterfly to the southeast and a big island with a parrot to the southwest. which way, buddy?
go to the parrot !
alright, now i'm on the big island with the parrot, where to next, pal?
Do you see the elephant?
yup! i see the elephant to the left, heading over there now! where to next, amigo?
use the rocks and cross over to the giraffe! dont take the rocks that lead to the crocodile!
cool! now i'm with the giraffe
which direction now?
use the twig, go to the island with the snake, there is treasure if you can make it past
gotcha, standing right next to the snake now, don't worry i made sure not to step on it! where to next, amigo?
go to the treasure!
on it! woohooo! found the treasure! *finished* thanks for guiding me, you're genius!
hey there, estas listo?
Si!
awesome! head a little bit left from where that white dog is sitting until you come across a trail near a wooden bench
don't go towards that florist stand, though! cross the trail and make a u-turn, headed back towards our furry friend. do this carefully, okay?
Okay!
great job! now, cross the wooden branch next to the dog and continue going south
do you see another white dog by a checkered picnic mat? you're on track! keep moving!
Im at the mat! where to now?
great, you're doing fantastic! now cross over that mat, graze past that delicious looking bowl of berries and keep heading towards the west
which way is west?
my bad! it's to your left. look for another wooden branch
it'll guide you to cross the river again, but this time head north. you got this!
towards the bridge?
nope, not quite there yet, just focus on crossing the river for now
once there, give the green bush a wide berth by circling around it from the right. you're doing great!
Thanks! now where to?
you're doing an amazing job! next, the florist stand is your destination
head there without actually touching the bush, alright?
i think i touched the bush :( im here
ah, no worries
can you see the bridge with two people riding bikes? head west and go under it. we're almost there!
UNder?
yep, under! to the left of the stand, you'll see the bridge
just go underneath it, mate!
okay i think im following
just past the bridge, you should see a bench with two elderly people reading newspapers
give them a smile!
Of course!
move slightly south from the elderly folks, between them and a wooden branch till you encounter a green bush next to the end of the branch
can you see it?
yes!
congrats! now, we're going to head east, just between the branch and the bush
okay!
now, just a few steps further east and
voila! you made it! can you see that cute brown deer? it's your final waypoint. well done!
Yay! thanks for your help, I think I poorly executed some of your directions but i did my best!.
oh, don't worry about it! you did an amazing job! games like these are more about the journey than the destination
hope you had fun, buddy!
I Did!
that's what i love to hear! you did great
thanks for playing along!
hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
Hey! Ready to start?
absolutely! i'm at the tent up north
where should i head first?
head southeast towards the cute little dog!
ah, got it! facing the pup now, what's next?
keep going until you see the path way
sure thing! i'm on a path now, spot a red mushroom to my right and a blue car ahead, what do i do now?
do you see the fire before the red mushroom?
oh yep! i see it! it's between the dog and the mushroom
i must have missed it. what next?
carefully go around it and towards the mushrooms!
got it, i'm by the red mushroom now
where to next, amigo?
perfect, now head down towards the blue car
right on, i'm at the blue car now! what's my next move?
make a little u-turn and follow the path down to the cool telescope!
i see it! arrived at the telescope now, where to?
do you see the bush by the telescope?
yep, it's right there
should i pass it, or go another way?
walk between the scope and the bush carefully and head towards the path again please
okay, i've done just that
i'm back on the path now. where should i go?
do you see the log cabin>
yes, i see a wooden house! is that our final destination?
yes! go there! great job
awesome! i've reached the house! *finished* that was fun, let's do that again soon!
hey there, estas listo?
Si
awesome! start by walking towards the first palm tree in front of you, on the southwest side. after that, take a right, go past the second tree, then take a hard left before you reach the third
keep heading straight around southwards. cool so far?
Cool! im looking at a cute dog now, where to?
awww, well go around the cute pup
swerve a little to your left and then take a right so you're heading sort of south-ish. you got this, buddy!
okay, im looking at a crab now!
awesome! he's guarding the way
turn right here and keep following the water, westwards. you're doing great!
where do you want me to turn right ?
turn right as if you're going along that big rock that's next to you
stay in the water, continue heading westwards. you're doing good, keep it up!
oh no! I see a shark!
yikes! steer clear of jaws! haha! just make a sharp turn right when you see the shark and keep on with it!
Okay, Im with a beach volleyball now
great! head back to dry land now, go between this beach ball and the rock that's next to it
then keep going north. we're almost there!
okay! I see a tent and what looks to be a speaker!
awesome! swerve a bit to your left and navigate between the speaker and the tent
you're nailing it!
okay im between the tent and speaker?
awesome! now, go around the tent in a semi-circle and start heading south
don't worry, you won't need to touch the water!
okay! I see a boat to my right
fantastic! that's a kayak, i think
go west now, slide right under it. you're nailing it!
OKay!
fantastic! now turn a sharp right so you're heading north, and follow along the side of the kayak
you're almost there!
which side of the boat should I be on ?
you should be on the east side of the kayak, buddy
keep up the good work!
okay!
great! you're near our ultimate goal - the little green bush
you've made it, my friend! this was fun, wasn't it?

general_survey.answer: Yes, I lived in europe for a year and spent a good chunk of time in Honduras for about 3 months. I know its not 6 but it felt worth mentioning

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.

How natural was your conversational partner’s language switching?

general_survey.answer: I really enjoyed it, I love spanglish
general_survey.question: Any final comments about your partner’s language switching?

general_survey.answer: I understand more spanish than I verbally speak, I was always very self conscious of my spanish since the only person who spoke it around me growing up was my mother. I never got to be fully immersed in the culture until my later years so I feel a bit like a fraud sometimes but I do know a lot of spanish.
general_survey.question: Any final comments about your language background?
